sponsor: Sun Pharma Advanced Research Company Limited
briefTitle: Evaluation of Safety and Efficacy of PDP-716
officialTitle: A Randomized, Multi-Center, Investigator-Masked, Parallel Group, Equivalence Study of Once Daily Brimonidine Tartrate Ophthalmic Suspension Compared With Three Times Daily ALPHAGAN-PÂ® in Subjects With Open Angle Glaucoma, or Ocular Hypertension
summary: The study will be conducted to evaluate the efficacy and safety of topical administration of PDP-716 compared with brimonidine tartrate ophthalmic solution.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Mean Intraocular Pressure
